# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the query item.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String { get }
```

## Discussion

For example, in the URL `http://www.apple.com/search/?q=iPad`, the `name` parameter is `q`.

This string is not percent-encoded.

## Related Documentation

- **queryItems**: The query URL component as an array of name/value pairs.

## Reading a Query Item’s Name and Value

- **value**: The value for the query item.
